Name: Hilm
About the game: Hilm is a classic 3D runner with a 3rd person view. Play mode - Chapter : Clear to unlock the stage. - Randam board : Earn coins in random missions. - Spike Earn : Great for collecting coins. - Endless runner : End content Shop & Costume You can purchase costumes with the coins you collect.
